item.title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica: The Different Story GN 1
item.description: This “what if?” story, the first of a three-parter, takes an alternative perspective and relationship pairing to the original story. The result is an ironic but hardly necessary work likely intended to be a further deconstruction of the magical girl genre.

item.title: ANNCast - Merrill-Go-Round
item.description: Longtime fan, writer, cartoonist and Anime Weekend Atlanta demigod Dave Merrill stops by the show to chat about the good bad ol' days, running conventions, kids on his lawn, and more!
